text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some time later, I hear a knock on the<n>door of the training
staff office.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: I'm very glad to see you, Dober.
Of course I am, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Um, is what you said before still true?<n>Are you still willing to
support me?
choice_data_list: I'm very glad to see you, Dober.
Of course I am, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-it's nothing too deep. I just want to<n>win. I need to do this...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much. Then, well...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So please. Can you help me win?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: If you don't mind... Please help me<n>win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
This next scrimmage is my last<n>chance to offer up a win to
Trainer.
choice_data_list: We'll win it—together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Okay.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Okay.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thus begins a fair few days of<n>intense training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thus begins a fair few days of<n>intense training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She certainly has what it takes to be<n>an excellent runner,
and her<n>improvement day-to-day is tangible.<n>Some worries
linger, however.
choice_data_list: That was a great time, Dober.
That was a great time, Dober.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh? But still...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I felt like that was one of<n>my best too. But still...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm worried about not being able to<n>replicate these kinds of
results in front<n>of a crowd.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm worried about not being able to<n>replicate these kinds of
results in front<n>of a crowd.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go for another. Please<n>time me again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Having shared her thoughts, she<n>takes off once again. It
seems like<n>mental roadblocks are quite<n>deep-rooted.
choice_data_list: If only I could do something... anything....

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Seeing her continue to give it her all, a<n>thought occurs to me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even before I took over main training<n>duties, I've noticed
one thing about<n>the way she runs down the track.
choice_data_list:
(She never really looks at the stands, does
she?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Well, no, but isn't that normal? When<n>I'm running, I just
want to focus on<n>the track.
choice_data_list:
You may be making too much of an effort to
not look at them.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps thinking too much about not<n>looking at the stands is
causing a<n>break in her overall concentration.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Th-that's...
choice_data_list: Let's try something out before the scrimmage.
Let's try something out before the scrimmage.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What... do you want to try?
choice_data_list:
Even if it's just for a second, why don't you try
looking towards the spectators?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What?! I-I can't do that... I'm just<n>so—
choice_data_list: I'll be right there, cheering you on.
I'll be right there, cheering you on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: B-but!
choice_data_list:
I'll be cheering on a runner I have complete
faith in.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The day of the scrimmage race finally<n>arrives.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Oh my! Just look at all these people!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It's undoubtedly due to the rumors of<n>that famous trainer's
retirement.<n>There are likely many trainers looking<n>to scout
Dober themselves.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Even though it is known that she stillencounters some difficulties, sheis still a Mejiro after all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I guess so... Will she be okay,<n>though? She's been pushing
herself<n>way too hard, and I'm worried that<n>she's going to
get hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Ryan, I don't think you should<n>worry. She will
definitely be okay.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Right. I can tell just by looking at her<n>that something is
different today.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Bell...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Trainer... She's definitely come to<n>see me today, right? I
want to win. I<n>want to win! I want to win for her<n>today!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(But... It's all the same... My<n>heartbeat is overwhelmingly
loud...)
choice_data_list: Dober, over here!
Dober, over here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Ah... I looked... Right toward the<n>spectators...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Over there...)
choice_data_list: It's okay, Dober! You're a strong runner!
It's okay, Dober! You're a strong runner!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What're you yelling out... Dummy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: She really... believes in me...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's about to begin—the final race in<n>which Mejiro Dober's
chief trainer<n>can preside over.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's about to begin—the final race in<n>which Mejiro Dober's
chief trainer<n>can preside over.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clank!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(My heartbeat is still so loud... I still<n>don't think I'm able to
run exactly like<n>I do while training.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(I hate being the center of attention.<n>Their shouts, their
cheers, the very<n>sense of their presence... I don't<n>want to
look over at those who are<n>laughing at me...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But still... Haaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(But still! There are some over there<n>who do truly believe in
me!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'm strong... I'm capable and strong!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'm a strong Umamusumeee!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
First place... Bell, that was a<n>marvelous race. I'm so happy
for you,<n>and now—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer. Thank you very much for<n>coming today.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm the one who should bethanking you! I'm so happy tohave been able to see you win. Nownothing lingers on my mind before Iretire.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wait, that's a lie. There is one<n>thing. Bell, what do you
plan to do<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I plan to keep training with our<n>assistant trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You won't say "no" after all this,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Is that okay... with you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the retiring woman's good<n>graces, I complete the
contract to<n>become Mejiro Dober's new trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the retiring woman's good<n>graces, I complete the
contract to<n>become Mejiro Dober's new trainer.
